snippet: The team announced that it had instituted new internal controls to avoid embarrassments like losing possession of the shirt Piazza wore in the first New York game after Sept. 11.
abstract: New York Mets announces that new measures are being implemented to avoid embarrassments like losing possession of jersey Mike Piazza wore in first home game after Sept 11 terrorist attacks; three of team's minority owners had to repurchase jersey after selling it several years ago.
lead_paragraph: The team announced that it had instituted new internal controls to avoid embarrassments like losing possession of the shirt Piazza wore in the first New York game after Sept. 11.

headline.main: With Mike Piazza Jersey Regained, Mets Say They Have Made Procedural Changes
